hydratation.info: Prevents negative status effects while on Rainy weather

sandVeil.info: Prevents negative status effects while on Sandstorm weather

snowCloak.info: Prevents negative status effects while on Hail weather

grabGuard.info: Halves the damage received of Fighting-type moves

waterGuard.info: Halves the damage received of Water-type moves

flameGuard.info: Halves the damage received of Flame-type moves

curseGuard.info: Halves the damage received of Ghost-type moves

poisonGuard.info: Halves the damage received of Poison-type moves

iceGuard.info: Halves the damage received of Ice-type moves

psychicGuard.info: Halves the damage received of Psychic-type moves

fairyGuard.info: Halves the damage received of Fairy-type moves

leafGuard.info: Halves the damage received of Grass-type moves

plainGuard.info: Halves the damage received of Normal-type moves

sinisterGuard.info: Halves the damage received of Dark-type moves

steelGuard.info: Halves the damage received of Steel-type moves

dragonGuard.info: Halves the damage received of Dragon-type moves

bugGuard.info: Halves the damage received of Bug-type moves

rockGuard.info: Halves the damage received of Rock-type moves

groundGuard.info: Halves the damage received of Ground-type moves

flyingGuard.info: Halves the damage received of Flying-type moves

insomnia.info: Grants immunity to Sleep

immunity.info: Grants immunity to Poisoned

limber.info: Grants immunity to Paralysis

ownTempo.info: Grants immunity to Confused

magmaArmor.info: Grants immunity to Freeze

waterVeil.info: Grants immunity to Burn

marvelScale.info: Increases Defense by 50% if afflicted with a status effect

livingShield.info: Increases Special Defense by 50% if afflicted with a status effect

overgrow.info: Increases the power of Grass-type moves by 30% below 50% HP

blaze.info: Increases the power of Fire-type moves by 30% below 50% HP

swarm.info: Increases the power of Bug-type moves by 30% below 50% HP

torrent.info: Increases the power of Water-type moves by 30% below 50% HP

bastion.info: Increases the power of Steel-type moves by 30% below 50% HP

average.info: Increases the power of Normal-type moves by 30% below 50% HP

resolve.info: Increases the power of Fighting-type moves by 30% below 50% HP

mistify.info: Increases the power of Psychic-type moves by 30% below 50% HP

hexerei.info: Increases the power of Ghost-type moves by 30% below 50% HP

glimmer.info: Increases the power of Fairy-type moves by 30% below 50% HP

skyward.info: Increases the power of Flying-type moves by 30% below 50% HP

draconic.info: Increases the power of Dragon-type moves by 30% below 50% HP

noxious.info: Increases the power of Poison-type moves by 30% below 50% HP

solid.info: Increases the power of Rock-type moves by 30% below 50% HP

rime.info: Increases the power of Ice-type moves by 30% below 50% HP

voltage.info: Increases the power of Electric-type moves by 30% below 50% HP

hyperCutter.info: Prevents the lowering of the Attack stat

bigPecks.info: Prevents the lowering of the Defense stat

wonderSkin.info: 50% chance for received Status Effects to miss

synchronize.info: Inflicts active status effects to the attacker aswell

solarPower.info: Increases Special Attack by 50% on Sunny weather

iceBody.info: Increases Defense by 50% on Hail weather

rainDish.info: Increases Special Attack by 50% on Rainy weather

sandForce.info: Increases Attack by 50% on Sandstorm weather

static.info: 10% chance to inflict Paralysis when attacked

flameBody.info: 10% chance to inflict Burn when attacked

poisonPoint.info: 10% chance to inflict Poisoned when attacked

strangeCharm.info: 10% chance to inflict Confused when attacked

effectSpore.info: 5% chance to inflict Sleep when attacked

glacialBody.info: 5% chance to inflict Freeze when attacked

naturalCure.info: Status effects are cleared when switching Pokemon

technician.info: Multiplies by 1.5x the base damage of moves with equal or less than 60 power

scrappy.info: Ghost-type pokemon can be hit with Normal and Fighting-type moves

unaware.info: When attacking, ignores the target's stat changes

magicGuard.info: Can only take damage from direct damaging moves

strongJaw.info: "Fang"-related moves have their base damage multiplied by x2 (Fire Fang, Thunder Fang, Shark Jaws, Poison Fang, Ice Fang, Bug Bite, Psychic Fangs, Bite, and Crunch)

toughClaws.info: "Claw"-related moves have their base damage multiplied by x2 (Metal Claw, Razor Talons, Poison Claw, Shadow Claw, and Dragon Claw)

ironFist.info: "Punch"-related moves have their base damage multiplied by x1.5 (Dizzy Punch, Fire Punch, Thunder Punch, Bullet Punch, Poison Jab, Ice Punch, Mach Punch, Powerup Punch, Force Palm, Shadow Punch, Aurora Punch, Comet Punch, Dynamic Punch, and Rage Fist)

rivalry.info: Multiplies the damage by x1.5 when the opposite Pokemon shares a type

pickPocket.info: Increases the weight of rare item drops by 1% (Can stack)

brittleArmor.info: Increases Special Attack by 50% if afflicted with a status effect

grassyPelt.info: Prevents negative stat changes and status effects while on Rainy weather

sandyPelt.info: Prevents negative stat changes and status effects while on Sunny weather

moistPelt.info: Prevents negative stat changes and status effects while on Sandstorm weather

fieryPelt.info: Prevents negative stat changes and status effects while on Hail weather

pixiePelt.info: Prevents negative stat changes and status effects while on Foggy weather

chlorophyll.info: Increases Speed by 50% on Sunny weather

slushRush.info: Increases Speed by 50% on Hail weather

swiftSwim.info: Increases Speed by 50% on Rainy weather

sandRush.info: Increases Speed by 50% on Sandstorm weather

intimidate.info: Decreases enemy Attack by 50% when the opposing Pokemon enters the battle

dauntingLook.info: Decreases enemy Special Attack by 50% when the opposing Pokemon enters the battle

unburden.info: Increases Speed by 50% if no item is being held

moxie.info: Increases Attack by 50% when defeating a Pokemon

strategist.info: Increases Special Attack by 50% when defeating a Pokemon

sheerForce.info: Positive secondary effect of damaging moves are removed, and their damage is multiplied by x1.2

thickFat.info: Halves damage received from Fire and Ice-type moves

noGuard.info: Moves always hit regardless of the type

multiscale.info: Damage received is halved when over 50% HP

guts.info: Increases Attack by 50% if afflicted with a status effect, and nullifies the stat redution of the condition

skillLink.info: Moves that hit multiple times always hit their maximum amount

sharpness.info: "Sharp"-related moves have their base damage multiplied by x1.5 (Cut, Smart Strike, Air Slash, Ice Shard, Fury Cutter, X Scissor, Razor Leaf, Leaf Blade, Psycho Cut, Night Slash, Razor Shell, and Spacial Rend)

angerPoint.info: Increase Attack by 100% when hit with a super-effective move

justified.info: Increase Special Attack by 100% when hit with a super-effective move

filter.info: Super-effective damage taken multiplier is halved

reckless.info: Moves that execute slower than usual have their move power multiplied by x1.5

libero.info: Moves that execute faster than usual have their move power multiplied by x2

flashElectro.info: Nullifies received Electric-type moves and increases Speed by 50% after being hit with one

flashAqua.info: Nullifies received Water-type moves and increases Speed by 50% after being hit with one

flashPyro.info: Nullifies received Fire-type moves and increases Speed by 50% after being hit with one

flashUmbra.info: Nullifies received Ghost-type moves and increases Speed by 50% after being hit with one

flashVenum.info: Nullifies received Poison-type moves and increases Speed by 50% after being hit with one

flashCryo.info: Nullifies received Ice-type moves and increases Speed by 50% after being hit with one

flashPsycha.info: Nullifies received Psychic-type moves and increases Speed by 50% after being hit with one

flashFae.info: Nullifies received Fairy-type moves and increases Speed by 50% after being hit with one

flashHerba.info: Nullifies received Grass-type moves and increases Speed by 50% after being hit with one

tintedLens.info: Moves that are resisted by typing do instead normal damage

prankster.info: Ghost and Dark-type moves are x1.5 faster than usual

galeWings.info: Flying and Bug moves are x1.5 faster than usual

speedBoost.info: Increases Speed by 50% when defeating a Pokemon

scorch.info: Enemy damage over time from Burn is doubled while this Pokemon is active

corrosion.info: Enemy damage over time from Poisoned is doubled while this Pokemon is active

dancer.info: "Dance"-related moves are executed twice as fast <span style="opacity:0.7">(Swords Dance, Feather Dance, Rain Dance, Agility, Dragon Dance, Belly Drum, Aqua Step, Revelation Dance, Quiver Dance, Drum Beating, and Fiery Dance)<span>

cacophony.info: "Sound"-related moves are executed twice as fast <span style="opacity:0.7">(Growl, Screech, Hyper Voice, Metal Sound, Bug Buzz, Snarl, Disarming Voice, Echoed Voice, Alluring Voice, Boomburst, Sparkling Aria, Chatter, Roar Of Time, Clanging Scales, Relic Song, and Torch Song)<span>

megaLauncher.info: "Pulse"-related moves have their base damage multiplied by x1.5 <span style="opacity:0.7">(Fire Blast, Flash Cannon, Aurora Beam, Water Pulse, Energy Ball, Aura Sphere, Focus Blast, Rock Blast, Shadow Ball, Dragon Pulse, Dark Pulse, Moonblast, Hydro Cannon, and Chloroblast)<span>

metalhead.info: "Head"-related moves have their base damage multiplied by x1.5 <span style="opacity:0.7">(Iron Head, Rock Smash, Zen Headbutt, Head Charge, Megahorn, Psyshield Bash, and Headlong Rush)<span>

imposter.info: Copies the positive stat increases of the enemy

toxicBoost.info: Increases the Damage dealt by x1.2 when afflicted with Poisoned, and nullifies the damage overtime caused by it

flareBoost.info: Increases the Damage dealt by x1.2 when afflicted with Burn, and nullifies the damage overtime caused by it

supremeOverlord.info: Increases the Damage dealt by x1.15 for every team member defeated

gorillaTactics.info: Increases the Attack by x1.2, but prevents them from switching

beastBoost.info: Increases the highest stat of the user by 50% when defeating a Pokemon

quarkDrive.info: Increases the highest stat of the user by 50% on Electric Terrain

protosynthesis.info: Increases the highest stat of the user by 50% on Sunny weather

drizzle.info: Changes the weather to Rainy when entering or switching into the battle

drought.info: Changes the weather to Sunny when entering or switching into the battle

sandStream.info: Changes the weather to Sandstorm when entering or switching into the battle

snowWarning.info: Changes the weather to Hail when entering or switching into the battle

somberField.info: Changes the weather to Foggy when entering or switching into the battle

electricSurge.info: Changes the weather to Electric Terrain when entering or switching into the battle

grassySurge.info: Changes the weather to Grassy Terrain when entering or switching into the battle

mistySurge.info: Changes the weather to Misty Terrain when entering or switching into the battle

sereneGrace.info: Secondary effect of moves are executed twice

hugePower.info: Attack stat is multiplied by x2

contrary.info: Inverts stat changes. Positive changes become negative, and negative become positive

protean.info: Changes the type of the user to match the type of the used move

simple.info: Stat changes on the user are boosted by a stage

parentalBond.info: Moves are executed a second time, at half power

moody.info: Every turn, raises two stats by 100% for one turn

darkAura.info: Multiplies by x1.1 the power of Dark-type moves of all team members

normalize.info: All moves become Normal-type moves, and their power is multiplied by x1.2

ferrilate.info: Normal-type moves become Steel-type moves, and their power is multiplied by x1.3

glaciate.info: Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves, and their power is multiplied by x1.3

terralate.info: Normal-type moves become Ground-type moves, and their power is multiplied by x1.3

toxilate.info: Normal-type moves become Poison-type moves, and their power is multiplied by x1.3

hydrolate.info: Normal-type moves become Water-type moves, and their power is multiplied by x1.3

pyrolate.info: Normal-type moves become Fire-type moves, and their power is multiplied by x1.3

chrysilate.info: Normal-type moves become Bug-type moves, and their power is multiplied by x1.3

galvanize.info: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves, and their power is multiplied by x1.3

gloomilate.info: Normal-type moves become Dark-type moves, and their power is multiplied by x1.3

espilate.info: Normal-type moves become Psychic-type moves, and their power is multiplied by x1.3

aerilate.info: Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves, and their power is multiplied by x1.3

pixilate.info: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves, and their power is multiplied by x1.3

verdify.info: Normal-type moves become Grass-type moves, and their power is multiplied by x1.3
